Audio Description: On a white background with a dark blue rectangle in the middle is a large American flag fluttering in the breeze on a staff that is crowned with a golden eagle figure and two gold tassels. Below the dark blue is a smaller black rectangle of the same width with yellow text that says “Buy US war savings bonds & stamps now”. To the left, positioned half on the white background and half on the dark blue is a yellow rectangle with black text that says “We can we will we must! Franklin D. Roosevelt”. In the lower left corner of this rectangle is a pale gray silhouette of a Minute Man Revolutionary War soldier. A gray border frames the entire poster.
Creator: United States. Treasury Department
Description: Poster, 29 x 52 cm, artist: Carl Paulson
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.

Title: We can, we will, we must!: buy U. S. war savings bonds & stamps now
